    public class RentalProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Created by Anders Mikkelsen on 27.01.15. This singleton is the backbone of the rental system and administers flow.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    mikand@westerdals.no
